law.history: Repealed 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 7. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2739j-78b, 2739j-78c.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Statement as to weight of trucks; revocation of certificate or permit for misrepresentation.
